title: Love's Labour Lost
body: There is no more sisyphean task than cleaning a movie theater auditorium.
author: Dan

comments.author: Paul
comments.body: Great word usage...sisyphean...I'll have to use that in a sentence today!  Just imagining pushing that round stone up the hill for eternity...

comments.author: Duke1974
comments.body:
Yay! Sisyphus! The only bit of Greek legend that I remember and that's only because it was in the cartoon Ulysses 31.

M
